Text.Language: Rasi ouoh yel/l: w~ p~genoc n~nirwmi: je pair/] a~V]: menre pikocmoc.
Rejoice and be happy, O human race, for God so revealed, His love to the world.
إفرحوا وتهللوا ياجنس البشر لأنه هكذا أحب الله العالم.
Hwcte n~tef]: m~pefs/ri m~menrit: qa n/eynah] e~rof: eyrouwnq sa e~neh.
That He gave, His beloved Son, for those who believe in Him, so that they may live forever.
حتى بذل أبنه الحبيب عن المؤمنين به لكي يَحَيوا إلى الآبد.
Au[~ro gar e~rof: hiten tefmetsenh/t: ouoh afouwrp nan: m~pefj~voi et[oci.
For He has overcome, by His mercy, and sent unto us, His Almighty Arm.
لأنه غلب من تحننه وأرسل لنا ذراعه العالية.
Afsai cwmatikwc: e~bol qen ]paryenoc: a[ne c~perma n~rwmi: sa n~tefcw] m~mon.
He shone in the flesh, taken from the Virgin, without the seed of man, in order to save us.
أشرق جسدياً من العذراء بغير زرع بشر حتى خلصنا.
